-- | Snap server backend for yaml-rpc
--   
--   This package provides Snap-based server backend for yaml-rpc package.
@package yaml-rpc-snap
@version 1.0.3

module Network.YAML.Snap

-- | Snap handler for any method
handleApi :: Dispatcher IO -> Snap ()

-- | Snap handler for POST method
handleApiPost :: Dispatcher IO -> Snap ()
